column1: # Data from KNMI: Royal Dutch Meteorological Institute.
# This data contains the following columns:
# Currently lightning is all type 4: Cloud -> ground discharge
# date:                time of event [GPS calendar date]
# time:                time of event [GPS time of day]
# nanoseconds:         time of event upto microsecond accuracy [number of nanoseconds after timestamp]
# Values of -1 or -999 indicate a problem in that measurement or
